Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: EZSA
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why all this negative reviews pop up here.I always have a realistic expectation of a hotel I just booked.This time thanks to all the poor comments the apartment was above my expectations.The room was clean with amazing beds.The staff was helpful.Midwest Apartments are not advertised under 5 star flag and I did not expect that either.

Reviews.Title: “Poor”
Reviews.Author: TTZulu
Reviews.Content: Had to stay here due to unavailability of rooms in Dubai due to the food festival. Cleanliness of room was poor - wasnt satisfied with bed linen and had to call housekeeping to ensure i got a fresh set. Very keen to charge you for an extra hour of early check-in but delivery of service leaves a lot to be desired. Customer service was poor. Quite clear that motivation among staff is low. Management really needs to step up. Unless you have no other options - better to avoid.

Reviews.Title: “Basic but Friendly hotel-apartments”
Reviews.Author: washbrol
Reviews.Content: The Grand Midwest Express Hotel Apartments are rather basic and worn down, located in a cluster of non-specific building developments. Good for families needing space, and/or cooking/washing facilities in the room, or for long-term stays for business on a budget. Very firm comfortable bed, and quiet, allowed for a great night's sleep; this was the highlight of my experience. Service: The staff, mostly philipino like in much of Dubai, were friendly and helpful. Rooms: Large, tiled floors, with kitchenette. The kitchenette and bathroom were both old, tired, worn-down; not of the caliber of most new Dubai business hotels. Location: In Discovery Gardens, the best part is proximity by taxi to the Marina (5-10min; inexpensive, ie 15-25 AED). Also, proximity by foot, 10min, to Ibn Battuta mall, if shopping is a priority. In proximity: A few basic conveniences are next door, in adjacent buildings, including a Subway sandwhich shop, massage parlor, mini-mart, and one or two other basic restaurant/lounges. Ibn Battuta Mall is apparently large, though we couldn't find much of it, and were overall unimpressed. Includes a functional simple gym; was a bit tired and old feeling, but did see several people using it.

Reviews.Title: “This apartment should be one star”
Reviews.Author: Myrna P
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this apartment hotel for 6 nights 16Feb-22Feb2012. Booked 2 rooms with 2 king beds for the rest of my family. Although I requested for early check in, the reception was adamant that we be charged for few hours. So I left and "killed" some time at my sister's flat in Dubai. During our stay my room was not cleaned for 3 days! I left the sign "please make up the room" and I came back with the sign "do not disturb" so I found out the room was not cleaned. One of the housekeeper informed that he was only one on duty to clean up the whole building! Although the staff are friendly and helpful but this apartment is badly managed. If you want begging for cleaners, not working fridge, flooding washing machine to be part of your daily routine in Dubai then this is the right apartment to stay. I would rate this apartment one star for management.

Reviews.Title: “What more can you ask for?”
Reviews.Author: solodrifter
Reviews.Content: I accidentally booked this hotel; however I was extremely satisfied with my stay here. The hotel is a bit secluded but its very close to the subway system and the mall. Also there were a variety of eateries surrounding this hotel. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Not that bad”
Reviews.Author: GOKeeffe81
Reviews.Content: We stayed there in a studio apartment for 2 weeks over the Christmas holidays, as we had family members living very close by. Overall it was a great place in terms of amenities and location. The Ibn Battuta Mall is only about 10 minutes walk away and has everything you really need. There are several little shops around to buy the morning paper, milk, water etc. The Metro station is a good 15 minute walk away but brings you everywhere and is really handy. The room itself was spacious. It is only a studio apartment but we had a little kitchen with fridge, cooker and washer/dryer. There were also two beds; one single bed and double bed. But it was a little dirty. Since we were at the beach so often, the build up of sand in the apartment was noticeable and certain areas of the room appeared to never be cleaned, which was a little off-putting. I bought my own cleaning supplies and cleaned the apartment the first day. The staff were a little difficult at times especially when it came to booking 7-seater taxis. We never managed to get one booked by them as they came up with all sorts of excuses. We almost missed two dinners because of this and complaining about it seemed pointless. Overall though the value for money was great and we had a fantastic holiday there and we would probably stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Roomy, not a hotel”
Reviews.Author: WorlTraveler2008
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my father in a one bedroom apartment. The apartment was large and roomy. However, the furniture had kids drawing on it. Only one set of towels exist. They placed a bed I. The living room!

Reviews.Title: “Good for Stay, food service needs to be looked on”
Reviews.Author: KapilGodhani
Reviews.Content: Hotel is good for staying. Location is good and accessible from nearest bus stand and metro. however food service is not good. Need to work out on food service to make it better. Also need to work out on staff who is serving food.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT CONSIDER- STAFF CALLED POLICE BECAUSE WE COMPLAINED ABOUT BAD INTERNET CONNECTION!”
Reviews.Author: diamandi
Reviews.Content: absoultely NOTHING was good about our stay at grand midwest express! there were no towels, i called 5 times in one night to have house keeping bring 4 towels. the toilet seat in room 619 and 116 were broken and danergous to sit on. the toilets were leaking. the room smelt of curry. there was only 2 glass cups, 3 bowls, 3 mugs yet the paper in the cupboard said there were more?? the fridge wasnt working the bins were broken. the wardrobe smelt of BAD body odor. the bedheads still had previous accommodaters hairs all over it! the bed sheets were filthy with chocolate or poo? lounge chairs still had scuff marks and pens stains. phone book had teard out paper sheets missing. the carpet mats were abosultely disgusting and gave allegies. cutterly drawer covered in ants. we were charged full price even after complaining- no room change or upgrades. hotel staff very rude and not helpful. we purchased internet and the signal was poor and we asked for help no one came and we were still charged.. we had no other choice but to pay as the boy behind desk threatened to call police! room was only serviced once out of a 5 day stay. nothing was washed nor replenished, we forcefully had to call the reception desk to have toilet paper and towels brought to our room. DO NOT STAY HERE! pictures are deceiving and hotel is lying about their details.

Reviews.Title: “Worst place ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: sana28
Reviews.Content: Never stay in this hotel, nothing is properly working (internet, toilet ...) and they will tell you that it is not their problem but your problem. They told me internet is not working because of my laptop as I found 3 networks. People speak to you as if you are a dog, shout at you and do not listen to what you have to say, they have no client consideration. you even need to ask to make sure they will give you soap. They do not want you to speak to the management. Avoid in any case, does not worse the price at all!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Right next to the big power lines”
Reviews.Author: Torborg
Reviews.Content: Quite far from central Dubai and all the sights and things to do, but quite close to the railway and to Ibn Battuta Mall (10-15 minutes walk). However it is right beside (less than hundred metres away from) some huge power lines going into an aluminium factory, so I was not happy staying there, espesially nit with a baby. The room was small, and included a badly equipped kitchen corner. Neither the floor nor the kicthen stuff were clean when we got there, and there was nothing to wash it with (brush, sponge, detergent, etc). The kitchen was so poorly equipped that it was nearly impossible to make any proper food there. If you stay, make sure you bring your own cuttlery and things for cutting and stirring. There was a water boiler there, but it didn't match the socket. Washing machine was ok and actually worked.

Reviews.Title: “Don't understand the fuss...............”
Reviews.Author: doylepeterv
Reviews.Content: My partner and I stayed at this hotel for a week to attend my sons wedding (he lives in Dubai) at his recomendation and we could not understand why people have complained about the place so much. We found it to be clean and comfortable and all the staff that we dealt with were polite and helpful. We would recommend this place to anyone visiting Dubai from the UK.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: porktraveler
Reviews.Content: I'm not really hard to please and i just pretend the services i paid for and nothing else . We stay there for 16 days and we had a one bed room apartment. First of all I thing I was bitten by bugs several times. me only thank god the bugs didn't touched my fiancee . The housekeeping at the first 5 days i tipped the guys for their work but when i realize that they weren't doing their work such as not giving us 2 towels but only one .. not giving us toilet papers and tissue i quit tipping them .. To be fair i have to say that maybe they gave us 2 towels a couple of time and the first week they gave us toilet papers but then we received nothing . I had to buy my self tissue and toilet papers . You can't invite friends inside the rooms .. I'm not saying that I wanted my friends to sleep over but i wanted to have a cup of tea or dinner in a place where could have a little bit of privacy than a restaurant or a coffee shop . The food is horrible we had breakfast there the first morning,, go buy something outside and make your own breakfast .

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel for stay in discovery Gardens”
Reviews.Author: 786sameer
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean , the rooms facility are nice to use , so close to ibn Batuta mall & metro station . This hotel was grate for low budget plan in travel .

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: WolvesLogistics
Reviews.Content: First impression not good. When checking in another member of staff pushed in and gave the receptionist something else to do. I was staying here for at least 6 weeks. My room had a washer dryer but it didn't dry. 4 separate members of staff came to check it (there were no instructions) and 1 stayed watching it for the full cycle sure I was lying. Eventually it was replaced. Fridge filled with water daily. If you pay in advance by credit card they will have lost the receipt and only find it if you argue for at least 3 days (this happened to me twice). Reception staff are mostly inefficient and rude. Most bedding and towels stained and frayed. Convenient location but thats about all you can say.

Reviews.Title: “Simply Amazing!!!! Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: VishalJSalot
Reviews.Content: I have been there in 2 room studio appartments. It is really gr8 experience to be there. Its very new area. New hotel in Jabel ali area. surrounding location is not good as mostly industrial area near by. However near to upcoming IBN Batuta mall metro station. walking distance almost. Food quality is superb for the people who eats non veg. But for veg people little bit difficult to stay in this hotel as I found same kind of veg food everyday for almost 3 days. However stay was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Let down by the small things”
Reviews.Author: dannymcl
Reviews.Content: Booked this in advance but on arrival was told they were full and that they were going to put me up in their downtown hotel. As my office was close to Dubai Marina, I said that was not going to happen and they better find me a room. Eventually got the Deluxe Studio I booked but the door was insecure and I could open it using the old credit card trick - something the hotel did not seem to be aware of. Indeed it was useful one evening when I left my card in the car - I just opened the door with a credit card pushed into the gap in the door. Some things were missing from a hotel that essentially is meant to be for those longer stays - frying pan, decent saucepan, cutting board, oven gloves, large bowls, peeler. Had to ask for some and buy others which was not good. After a coupel of nights in the room which has twin beds, I found small brown insects sitting on the headboard and on the sheets. I am not speculating what they are as I am not an entomologist, but when I pointed them out, there was a lot of embarrassment and an immediate room change but to an ordinary studio which was smaller and which had such a poor WiFi signal that I could not connect. Given that the WiFi connection was chargeable, this made the place an unnacceptable location for a business trip and I moved out. Overall, it would be tolerable for a few days on a quick trip to Dubai and if you had a car - but for a longer stay - no! Don't. Fortunately, I found the ZiQoo Apartments next door - same layout and style of building - there are several in this area of Discovery Gardens - but a world of difference. Read my review of that place. Final point, staff at Grand Midwest Express were excellent, they were helpful and did their best, it just seems like that the place is not quite on the ball in terms of quality.

Reviews.Title: “Great value apartment for a 5 night stay”
Reviews.Author: cornishtim
Reviews.Content: The Grand Midwest is in the Jebel Ali area of Dubai (next to Ibn Battuta Mall and Discovery Gardens), so isn't the most convenient for the centre of Dubai, but isn't far away from the Marina area. We were visiting friends in Discovery Gdns so was perfect for us. We got it for AED 1000 for 5 nights from booking.com (c.£200) which is a bargain for an apartment (deluxe) with a fridge and cooker. The room was big, clean, quiet and the super-king bed was comfortable too. Sure, if you want to stay in style with beautiful bars/beaches/pools then this isn't for you, but then you can't beat the price if you're just using it as a bed for a few nights. Make sure you get what you pay for, as they tried to give us a normal apartment, but after checking they gave us the deluxe we paid for.

Reviews.Title: “Exllent Hotel Of Dubai”
Reviews.Author: UsaShinna
Reviews.Content: The staff ( Naveed Anwar ) very friendly, clean room and luxury service.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff and good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sameershahkhan
Reviews.Content: Every thing was great , when you check in try to ask the staff to give you room in the high floor .. it was great , the staff was friendly , the rooms were clean and they didn't let us wait long for our rooms when we checked in I liked to extend my accomadation for longer time, but unfortunatellty I could not & I must return back to my job as soon as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Very good and nice”
Reviews.Author: travelerNatalia
Reviews.Content: I liked this hotel so much , its clean and nice, the room is big and really beautiful , has everything inside , kitchen is big and feels like home . No mistakes in the service or hotel look. The hotel is near good shopping mall, and close to Shaih Zaid ( the end of the street toward Abu Dhabi), its better to rent a car if you stay in this hotel for long time , because you might face transportation problem. As for the hotel , its very good for very small money.

Reviews.Title: “It was a good experience and gorgeous rooms”
Reviews.Author: gavinfriends
Reviews.Content: I stayed here in march with friends. We went to experience dubai in general(young tourists). It was a lovely hotel. Size of the rooms were great, and accommodated for everything you needed. For example the kitchen was big and very helpful when you needed to cook yourself and save the pennies for clothes shopping. Staff were kind and friendly and willing to help you with you trip plans. If we did experience a problem, we addressed it to the staff and it got sorted so no problems there. It was great being so close to shopping centres which were a short taxi ride away. taxi's seem to be quiet cheap. I would recommend this place to friends.

Reviews.Title: “It was nice, really nice!!”
Reviews.Author: ayaa1977
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in the Greens area close to Ibn Batotta Mall, in a fairly new building. At arrival we noticed that the entrance is basic but spacious. The staff were gracious and kind, smiling all the time. We checked in no time, and to our surprise we were upgraded from a studio to one bed room apartment and the receptionist didn't even mention it. It was a very nice surprise. The apartment is big, really big. The living room has a large leather sofa, a few more chairs, and plasma TV. The Kitchen is proper and well equipped. As for the bedroom, the room itself is spacious, the beds are large and comfy, and there is a plasma TV also in the bedroom. The room is equipped with two large closets, which was rather good, one of them has a safe box. There are two bathroom, one with a shower and a bath and one is only toilet, both were clean and neat. The breakfast was of a good variety but it wasn't impressive. The coffee they offered was instant coffee, which was of a poor taste. There are plenty of parking spaces, which is a big problem if you stay in a hotel in downtown Dubai. Bottom line, I got my money worth and more!!

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Midwest Express Hotel Apartments
HotelInfo.Address: Discovery Garden | Off Sheikh Zayed road, Dubai 125616, United Arab Emirates
